##03F

m<-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()%>% 
  setView(m,lng=9.168,lat=48.803,zoom=5)%>% 
  addMarkers(lng=city$Longitude,lat=city$Latitude, data=city,popup=~City, icon=ikono) %>% 
  addPolylines(lng = city$Longitude[1:8], lat =city$Latitude[1:8], layerId = NULL, group = NULL,
               stroke = TRUE, color = "green", weight = 2.5, opacity = 0.5,
               fill = FALSE, fillColor = "green", fillOpacity = 0.2, dashArray = NULL,
               smoothFactor = 1, noClip = FALSE, popup = NULL, popupOptions = NULL,
               label = NULL, labelOptions = NULL, options = pathOptions(),
               highlightOptions = NULL, data = getMapData(m)) %>%
  addPolylines(lng = city$Longitude[9:27], lat =city$Latitude[9:27], layerId = NULL, group = NULL,
               stroke = TRUE, color = "#03F", weight = 2.5, opacity = 0.5,
               fill = FALSE, fillColor = "green", fillOpacity = 0.2, dashArray = NULL,
               smoothFactor = 1, noClip = FALSE, popup = NULL, popupOptions = NULL,
               label = NULL, labelOptions = NULL, options = pathOptions(),
               highlightOptions = NULL, data = getMapData(m)) %>%
  addPolylines(lng = city$Longitude[28:nrow(citys)], lat =city$Latitude[28:nrow(citys)], layerId = NULL, group = NULL,
               stroke = TRUE, color = "red", weight = 2.5, opacity = 0.5,
               fill = FALSE, fillColor = "green", fillOpacity = 0.2, dashArray = NULL,
               smoothFactor = 1, noClip = FALSE, popup = NULL, popupOptions = NULL,
               label = NULL, labelOptions = NULL, options = pathOptions(),
               highlightOptions = NULL, data = getMapData(m))
